channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 在获得美国批准后，丹麦将向阿根廷出售 24 架 F-16 战机，预计耗资 21 亿克朗。
item.description:
Denmark will sell 24 of its F-16 warplanes to Argentina for an estimated cost of 2.1 billion kroner after receiving approval from the US in what is the South American nation’s first major defense purchase under President Javier Milei https://t.co/GyarXjQpWK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 北海油气生产商 Ithaca Energy 就埃尼公司英国上游资产的潜在交易签订排他性协议
item.description:
North Sea oil and gas producer Ithaca Energy enters into an exclusivity agreement in relation to a potential deal for Eni’s UK upstream assets https://t.co/4pU8KLiu2d

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，包括日本三井物产和 Rohto 在内的一个集团即将达成收购医药保健公司余仁生国际多数股权的交易
item.description:
A group including Japan’s Mitsui and Rohto is nearing a deal to acquire a majority stake in medicine and health-care company Eu Yan Sang International, sources say https://t.co/wd5BDx90uL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 在台湾央行行长发出上周的加息只是一次性的信号后，台湾掉期交易商迅速收回了对政策利率持续上调的押注。
item.description:
Taiwan swaps traders are quickly dialing back bets on a sustained increase in policy rates, after the island’s central bank chief signaled that last week’s hike was a one-off. https://t.co/LP830whfwj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 荷兰曾经是欧洲最开放的经济体，但现在舆论开始反对移民和企业，企业也威胁要用脚投票。
item.description:
Public opinion has turned against immigration and corporations in the Netherlands, once Europe’s most open economy, and companies are threatening to vote with their feet https://t.co/Sew5sGYO3M

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: Hennes & Mauritz 第一季度营业利润率有所增长，因为这家瑞典快速时尚专业公司更加注重提高盈利能力
item.description:
Hennes & Mauritz posted a stronger operating margin in the first quarter as the Swedish fast-fashion specialist tightens its focus on improving profitability https://t.co/YsQnBCDIOh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 印度卢比跌至历史新低，促使外国投资者重新评估他们对该国资产的疯狂购买，引发印度债券一年来最大的抛售潮
item.description:
The Indian rupee’s decline to a record low pushed foreign investors to reassess their frenzied buying of the country’s assets, triggering the biggest selloff in Indian bonds in a year https://t.co/hOhZwIb5fM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克不否认市场对 6 月降息的看法
item.description:
ECB’s Kazaks Doesn’t Dispute Market View of June Rate Cut https://t.co/6yYLjbOD4T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: Old Mutual 表示，受非洲资产规模最大的保险公司新业务 "非凡 "增长和市场份额增长的推动，去年利润激增 35%。
item.description:
Old Mutual said profit surged 35% last year, driven by “exceptional” growth in new business at Africa’s biggest insurer by assets and by market-share gains https://t.co/3nLtnhR8Om

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 由于保加利亚第二大党将不再试图组建政府，保加利亚即将举行紧急投票，这将是该国三年多来的第六次大选
item.description:
Bulgaria is getting closer to a snap vote, the sixth general election in just over three years, as the country’s second-biggest party won’t try to form a government https://t.co/otRPCwGEgg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚正在考虑将其正在进行的价值 106 亿美元的铁路项目延伸至与泰国接壤的边境，以减少与东南亚邻国的经济竞争。
item.description:
Malaysia is considering extending its ongoing $10.6 billion rail project closer to its border with Thailand, as it seeks to reduce economic competition with its Southeast Asian neighbor https://t.co/vB9fTTkiV0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 中国前女首富仍在从她摇摇欲坠的地产帝国中获取暴利。
item.description:
China’s former richest woman is still reaping a windfall from her crumbling property empire. https://t.co/2XviYW2Uq6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 财报发布后，比亚迪股价在香港下跌达 4.7%，跌幅为近两个月来最大。
item.description:
BYD shares declined as much as 4.7% in Hong Kong, the most in nearly two months, after the earnings report. https://t.co/qYIQSD6Xiu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 随着美国加强对石油流动的审查，阿曼附近海域正成为船对船运输俄罗斯石油前往印度的热点地区
item.description:
The waters off Oman are emerging as a hot spot for ship-to-ship transfers of Russian oil heading to India, as the US steps up scrutiny of the flows https://t.co/NDqsyMx2sI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 泰国表示，预计未来三年将获得至少 150 亿美元的外国直接投资
item.description:

item.title: 议会的调查将考验波兰中央银行行长的决心，他是法律与公正最高级别的盟友之一。
item.description:
A parliamentary probe will test the resolve of Poland's central bank governor, one of the most senior Law & Justice allies left in office https://t.co/mXI6cmiUiV

item.title: 巴尔的摩表明，为新基础设施融资才是真正的 "过河拆桥"，@johnauthers 如是说。另：西非可可紧缺
item.description:
Baltimore shows that the real bridge too far is financing new infrastructure, says @johnauthers. Plus: Cocoa crunch in West Africa https://t.co/aGsB6u0pN4

The Baltimore bridge collapse may cause months of trade disruption https://t.co/BsIVwlS6jJ

item.title: 据美联社报道，新泽西州有人克服了重重困难，赢得了 11.2 亿美元的兆彩大奖，打破了去年 12 月以来的连胜纪录。
item.description:
Someone in New Jersey overcame the odds and won the $1.12 billion Mega Millions jackpot, breaking a winless streak that dated to last December, AP reports https://t.co/EBfPX2bW48

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）一直在将自己塑造成欧洲外交政策的实际形象代言人。但并非他的所有盟友都相信他是他们利益的最佳捍卫者
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron has been fashioning himself into the Europe's de-facto figurehead on foreign policy. But not all his allies are convinced he’s the best champion of their interests https://t.co/BnQXlDZ6c3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 南非央行将于周三连续第五次维持利率不变，并预示着预期的降息周期将推迟启动，通胀风险仍偏向上行。
item.description:
South Africa’s central bank is set to keep interest rates unchanged for a fifth time in a row on Wednesday and signal a delayed start to an anticipated cutting cycle, with inflation risks still skewed to the upside https://t.co/1gB5BkQrZx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 美国保护红海的 "万无一失 "任务没有奏效。
item.description:
The US 'no fail' mission to protect the Red Sea isn't working. https://t.co/oZjjEIYqn1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜表示，中国将致力于促进与亚洲经济体的货币合作，以增强该地区的金融稳定性
item.description:
People’s Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said the country will aim to boost currency cooperation with Asian economies to enhance financial stability in the region https://t.co/qiGPEAwAxW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）取消了其物流部门的上市计划，这使香港上市市场复苏的最后一大希望破灭，也给金融中心的领导者带来了寻找新的复兴之路的压力。
item.description:
One of Hong Kong’s last big hopes for a resurgence of its IPO market has been dashed by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s move to scrap a listing of its logistics unit, piling pressure on the financial hub’s leaders to find new paths to a revival https://t.co/i5cdmhAY4t

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 新加坡第一季度的写字楼租金创下 15 年新高，一反困扰其他主要金融中心的商业地产不景气局面
item.description:
Office rents in Singapore reached a 15-year high in the first quarter, defying the commercial property slump plaguing other major financial hubs https://t.co/pe1lurKthe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 游戏制造商 Munchables 证实，一名黑客从该公司盗取了 6,300 万美元，加密货币行业遭遇了今年最大的安全事件之一。
item.description:
The crypto sector suffered one of its biggest security incidents this year after a hacker swiped $63 million from Munchables, the game maker confirms https://t.co/rbFRcYYQp7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 在因贸易限制和网络攻击指控而导致双边关系持续紧张之际，习近平主席在北京会见了一批美国企业高管。
item.description:
President Xi Jinping has met with a group of American business executives in Beijing as bilateral tensions continue to rise over trade restrictions and accusations of cyberattacks. https://t.co/YBbSE2yINU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已跃居世界首富行列--然而，他的法律纠纷却让这位美国共和党（GOP）推定提名人和破产老手面临有史以来最大规模的现金催收
item.description:
NEW: Donald Trump has jumped the ranks of the world’s richest — yet his legal woes have the presumptive GOP nominee and veteran of bankruptcies facing his biggest-ever cash call https://t.co/9URcE7U373

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：日元兑美元汇率跌至 1990 年以来最低点
item.description:
BREAKING: The yen plunges to its lowest against the US dollar since 1990 https://t.co/VAv0LWHGmo pic.twitter.com/ssw9zo282u
